name: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance to erase his criminal record.

name: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulation and joins a rebellion.

name: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole to ensure humanity's survival.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

name: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge and fights his way back to honor.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in a series of crime stories.

name: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of a cunning serial killer.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

name: Schindler's List
description: In Nazi-occupied Poland, a businessman saves over a thousand Jewish refugees.

name: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with low intelligence who inadvertently influences historical events.

name: Saving Private Ryan
description: During WWII, a group of soldiers is sent to find a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges, a black man accused of murder.

name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight to save the galaxy from the Empire.

name: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop the threat of Loki and his alien army.

name: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown, allowing dinosaurs to run amok.

name: Back to the Future
description: A teenager travels back in time and meets his future parents.

name: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
